metadata.title: Geospatial Data Analysis and Mapping Techniques in Geoinformatics

abstract.text: Geoinformatics integrates geographic data with computational techniques for spatial analysis and visualization. This study explores spatial data modeling and geographic information systems.

body_text.text: Geographic Information Systems (GIS) enable the storage, processing, and visualization of spatial data across multiple domains.
Remote sensing imagery and vector datasets were processed using spatial interpolation and coordinate transformations.
The results demonstrate improved spatial accuracy in land-use classification and terrain mapping.
